title: The Taggerung
description: The fourteenth saga in the epic Redwall series -- now in paperback.Where the power of a Redwall heritage is proved to be stronger than that of an evil incarcerator.A baby otter is kidnapped from Redwall Abbey by the Juska, a ruthless band of villains who believe he is a Taggerung -- a legendary animal said to have supernatural fighting skills. Their leader, Sawney Rath, raises the young otter as his own son, and trains him to be a ruthless killer. But the Redwall spirit cuts deep and as the Taggerung reaches adolescence he begins to dream of another life.From the Paperback edition.
author: Brian Jacques
